body: Women tend to vote in-group, to protect women, even over men and children. They also love being part of the "what's popular now" crowd and don't like being the one stray from the herd. Combined with being easily manipulated emotionally and, yeah, you have a recipe for disaster when you give them voting rights and they outnumber men, but the 19th will never be repealed, it would have to be destroyed along with society. Women are prime suckers for liberals who know how to manipulate them to get the vote, while also being sacred cows for conservatives, who white knight for even the lowest of the female species. Hell, they can't even hold them to account for aborting their own babies, it always ends up that women are "victims" of their own decisions, and someone else is to blame.

body:
Nice try, but once again your powers of deduction have failed you. Anyone with a modicum of intelligence can easily find peer reviewed studies and data on these facts, but I guess you can't be bothered, despite all your bluster about how studied you are. Hell, anyone can take a simple look at the fashion industry and see that there is no question as to the fact that women are herd creatures and hate being out of the loop or the odd ball out.

Go ahead and keep patting yourself on the back, Sherlock, but your responses continue to betray your intelligence.

body:
You have it backwards. A lot of women *don't* want to be ultra feminine and girly, but The Girls<sup>TM</sup> will kick them out as a kind of traitor if they don't behave identically in every way, which usually includes misandry and bashing anything that's not all pretty pink and girly. Can't hang out with guys either, as sadly they're usually too embarrassed to be around a girl. So the social mask goes on to be accepted by the other girls. And with the "toxic masculinity" bullshit it's getting even worse. Boys are stupid and the cause of all problems, gossip is all that is talked about, tomboys hardly even exist anymore. Girls with ASD are now underdiagnosed partly because they face more pressure to conform and end up masking their symptoms.

> Women those aren't feminine choose to be trans.

Not usually true, and the cases where they do think they're FtM because of social issues could be significantly reduced if they weren't expected to act a certain way to be a "real woman" or whatever.
body_html:

A lot of women don't want to be ultra feminine and girly, but The GirlsTM will kick them out as a kind of traitor if they don't behave identically in every way, which usually includes misandry and bashing anything that's not all pretty pink and girly. Can't hang out with guys either, as sadly they're usually too embarrassed to be around a girl. So the social mask goes on to be accepted by the other girls. And with the "toxic masculinity" bullshit it's getting even worse. Boys are stupid and the cause of all problems, gossip is all that is talked about, tomboys hardly even exist anymore. Girls with ASD are now underdiagnosed partly because they face more pressure to conform and end up masking their symptoms.

Women those aren't feminine choose to be trans.

Not usually true, and the cases where they do think they're FtM because of social issues could be significantly reduced if they weren't expected to act a certain way to be a "real woman" or whatever.

body:
Humans are herd creatures, and men are no exception. But they have an easier situation socially with regards to fitting in. Most guys are part of smaller groups with similar beliefs and interests, and don't have to fit in with every other male in the world. However most girls' only option is the collective whole of "the girls", and not fitting in with every other girl leaves them with nowhere else to go; and the guy groups aren't an option, because they have been trained since day one to be embarrassed and ashamed of having anything to do with anything even remotely associated with girls and will refuse to hang out with them. It's not like with guys, where not fitting in just makes you unpopular, for girls it can often mean having zero friends at all. So unfortunately they have to deal with more conformity and the mask goes on, and eventually they become brainwashed. I'm not really sure why this is, but that's why there's so much conformity among them, and unlike you seem to think, it's hell for a good portion of them. And with the recent bullshit about "toxic masculinity" and third-wave feminism it's getting even worse. Girl groups now police divergent behavior even more, to make sure someone isn't a traitor. Tomboys practically don't exist anymore. Girls are now underdiagnosed with social disorders because they're forced to mask it in order to fit in.

You seem to devote a lot of your life to complaining about how women are stupid, worthless sex objects. I don't get what makes you loathe their existence so much.
body_html:
Humans are herd creatures, and men are no exception. But they have an easier situation socially with regards to fitting in. Most guys are part of smaller groups with similar beliefs and interests, and don't have to fit in with every other male in the world. However most girls' only option is the collective whole of "the girls", and not fitting in with every other girl leaves them with nowhere else to go; and the guy groups aren't an option, because they have been trained since day one to be embarrassed and ashamed of having anything to do with anything even remotely associated with girls and will refuse to hang out with them. It's not like with guys, where not fitting in just makes you unpopular, for girls it can often mean having zero friends at all. So unfortunately they have to deal with more conformity and the mask goes on, and eventually they become brainwashed. I'm not really sure why this is, but that's why there's so much conformity among them, and unlike you seem to think, it's hell for a good portion of them. And with the recent bullshit about "toxic masculinity" and third-wave feminism it's getting even worse. Girl groups now police divergent behavior even more, to make sure someone isn't a traitor. Tomboys practically don't exist anymore. Girls are now underdiagnosed with social disorders because they're forced to mask it in order to fit in.

You seem to devote a lot of your life to complaining about how women are stupid, worthless sex objects. I don't get what makes you loathe their existence so much.

body:
Degeneracy is pretty simple. It's disgusting. Walking around naked is degenerate. Why? Because in a civilized society, people wear clothes. Fucking dogs is degenerate, why? Because it is abhorrent and sinful. The same reasoning usually applies to homosexuality and all other forms of degeneracy. 

The constitution is bullshit. Traditionalism is core to a society and any society that strays away from tradition becomes a cesspit of sin and corruption, just like every democracy ever. 

> Most of the time any social ideal at all is just an agenda by someone who wants to control everybody

Most of the time a social ideal is either a manufactured Jewish scheme to erode traditionalism or a push by traditionalism to promote Godliness and morality. Fuck off with your anarchist bullshit.

body:
> Degeneracy is pretty simple. It's disgusting.

That's an opinion.

> Walking around naked is degenerate. Why? Because in a civilized society, people wear clothes. 

Because most people don't want to see that, in public. That's why.

> Fucking dogs is degenerate, why? Because it is abhorrent and sinful.

No, it's because it spreads diseases, and most importantly, is not consensual and is a form of rape.

> The same reasoning usually applies to homosexuality and all other forms of degeneracy.

No

> The constitution is bullshit.

It is, but because it doesn't limit the government *enough*. For its time it was a good idea though, and they had to compromise on some things.

> Traditionalism is core to a society and any society that strays away from tradition becomes a cesspit of sin and corruption, just like every democracy ever.

So you define "sin" as something non-traditional? How does that work?

> Most of the time a social ideal is either a manufactured Jewish scheme to erode traditionalism or a push by traditionalism to promote Godliness and morality. Fuck off with your anarchist bullshit.

Or we could just not have these dumb social ideals and we'd be a whole lot better off. And they are anything but Godliness and morality.

Degeneracy is pretty simple. It's disgusting.

That's an opinion.

Walking around naked is degenerate. Why? Because in a civilized society, people wear clothes.

Because most people don't want to see that, in public. That's why.

Fucking dogs is degenerate, why? Because it is abhorrent and sinful.

No, it's because it spreads diseases, and most importantly, is not consensual and is a form of rape.

The same reasoning usually applies to homosexuality and all other forms of degeneracy.

No

The constitution is bullshit.

It is, but because it doesn't limit the government enough. For its time it was a good idea though, and they had to compromise on some things.

Traditionalism is core to a society and any society that strays away from tradition becomes a cesspit of sin and corruption, just like every democracy ever.

So you define "sin" as something non-traditional? How does that work?

Most of the time a social ideal is either a manufactured Jewish scheme to erode traditionalism or a push by traditionalism to promote Godliness and morality. Fuck off with your anarchist bullshit.

Or we could just not have these dumb social ideals and we'd be a whole lot better off. And they are anything but Godliness and morality.

body:
> That's an opinion.

yes, and a correct one. If I were to say "shitting  on the floor is disgusting and unsanitary" that would also be an opinion, but it too is not wrong.

> Because most people don't want to see that, in public. That's why.

Exactly, how is that any different from what I said?

> No, it's because it spreads diseases, and most importantly, is not consensual and is a form of rape.

So your argument is that rape is neither abhorrent nor consensual?

> For its time it was a good idea though, and they had to compromise on some things.

it was naive and stupid. Democracy is like communism, it's an opium for the masses which doesn't actually work.

> So you define "sin" as something non-traditional? How does that work?

Tradition defies sin. Sin is only traditional in a degenerate society the foundation of which is on excess and sin.

> Or we could just not have these dumb social ideals and we'd be a whole lot better off. And they are anything but Godliness and morality.

Point to me a Bible verse where God says "lol its okay you can cut your dick off and rape kids and have gay sex guys its totally fine". You can't. You *can* however find plenty of quotes stating the exact opposite: that such behavior is disgusting and sinful. 

Please tell me how we'd be better off allowing faggots to rape kids and push their degeneracy on everyone. Please tell me how your ideal "society" (or rather lack thereof) would function in your mind (because that's the only place it would function).

For its time it was a good idea though, and they had to compromise on some things.

So you define "sin" as something non-traditional? How does that work?

Tradition defies sin. Sin is only traditional in a degenerate society the foundation of which is on excess and sin.

Or we could just not have these dumb social ideals and we'd be a whole lot better off. And they are anything but Godliness and morality.

Point to me a Bible verse where God says "lol its okay you can cut your dick off and rape kids and have gay sex guys its totally fine". You can't. You can however find plenty of quotes stating the exact opposite: that such behavior is disgusting and sinful.

Please tell me how we'd be better off allowing faggots to rape kids and push their degeneracy on everyone. Please tell me how your ideal "society" (or rather lack thereof) would function in your mind (because that's the only place it would function).

body:
> yes, and a correct one. If I were to say "shitting on the floor is disgusting and unsanitary" that would also be an opinion, but it too is not wrong.

No, it's scientific. Shitting on the floor spreads germs. And it's also different in public than it would be in your own household.

> Exactly, how is that any different from what I said?

Because society doesn't see everything you do.

> So your argument is that rape is neither abhorrent nor consensual?

It's abhorrent, because it's non consensual.

> it was naive and stupid. Democracy is like communism, it's an opium for the masses which doesn't actually work.

And your solution is to jump to the totalitarian phase even sooner?

> Tradition defies sin. Sin is only traditional in a degenerate society the foundation of which is on excess and sin.

No, how you treat people defines sin.

> Point to me a Bible verse where God says "lol its okay you can cut your dick off and rape kids and have gay sex guys its totally fine". You can't. You can however find plenty of quotes stating the exact opposite: that such behavior is disgusting and sinful.

Only in the old testament, the book of your favorite enemy, the joos. I'm very surprised that you like Christianity, given your hatred for Jews, as its deity is a Jew. You also wouldn't like the part about not following the traditions of mankind very much, or the golden rule.

"There are castrates who were born that way from the womb, there are castrates who were castrated by people, and **there are castrates who castrate themselves because of the kingdom of the heavens**. Those who can take this, have it." - Matthew 19:12

> rape kids

I never claimed that this was okay.

body:
> And your solution is to jump to the totalitarian phase even sooner?

We're already in the totalitarian phase. Fascism and the Jew OWG are diametric opposites.

> No, how you treat people defines sin.

No, the Bible defines sin. And if you were literate, you'd realize I said Traditionalism DEFIES sin (as in, stands against it) not *defines* it.

> Only in the old testament, the book of your favorite enemy, the joos. I'm very surprised that you like Christianity, given your hatred for Jews, as its deity is a Jew.

None of the Holy Trinity is a Jew, mainly because only Christ walked the Earth as a man, and Christ was not a jew. Leastwise, not the *modern* definition of Jew. The Biblical Hebrew Jews are not in any way related to the Satanist, subhuman parasites we call jews today. 

> You also wouldn't like the part about not following the traditions of mankind very much, or the golden rule.

Purposefully misinterpreting verse and using semantics to try and "Gotcha!" me not only won't work but further convinces me that you're a member of the tribe. 

> "There are castrates who were born that way from the womb, there are castrates who were castrated by people, and there are castrates who castrate themselves because of the kingdom of the heavens. Those who can take this, have it." - Matthew 19:12

This has literally nothing to do with the issue at hand wtf

> I never claimed that this was okay. Stop making a fool of yourself.

Fags and Jews rape kids and an insane and disproportionate amount.

body:
> We're already in the totalitarian phase. Fascism and the Jew OWG are diametric opposites.

So you like totalitarianism as long as *you're* in charge and not an opposing party. Figures.

> No, the Bible defines sin. And if you were literate, you'd realize I said Traditionalism DEFIES sin (as in, stands against it) not defines it.

Traditionalism promotes idol worship, wrath, money and power, brutality, pointless wars, petty rules, following other people, etc. and has a long history of persecuting monotheists.

> None of the Holy Trinity is a Jew, mainly because only Christ walked the Earth as a man, and Christ was not a jew. Leastwise, not the modern definition of Jew. The Biblical Hebrew Jews are not in any way related to the Satanist, subhuman parasites we call jews today.

They are, but in any case the solution is to try and evangelize, and if they won't have it dust of your shoes and go to the next person. Instead of sitting here blaming them for everything.

> Purposefully misinterpreting verse and using semantics to try and "Gotcha!" me not only won't work but further convinces me that you're a member of the tribe.

> This has literally nothing to do with the issue at hand wtf

You mentioned cutting dicks off.

> Fags and Jews rape kids and an insane and disproportionate amount.

Unfortunately, so have most societies throughout history. It's harder to do in the US because of our puritanical attitude towards sex, but we just replace it with other bad things instead, so we're not any better overall.
body_html:
We're already in the totalitarian phase. Fascism and the Jew OWG are diametric opposites.

So you like totalitarianism as long as you're in charge and not an opposing party. Figures.

No, the Bible defines sin. And if you were literate, you'd realize I said Traditionalism DEFIES sin (as in, stands against it) not defines it.

Traditionalism promotes idol worship, wrath, money and power, brutality, pointless wars, petty rules, following other people, etc. and has a long history of persecuting monotheists.

None of the Holy Trinity is a Jew, mainly because only Christ walked the Earth as a man, and Christ was not a jew. Leastwise, not the modern definition of Jew. The Biblical Hebrew Jews are not in any way related to the Satanist, subhuman parasites we call jews today.

They are, but in any case the solution is to try and evangelize, and if they won't have it dust of your shoes and go to the next person. Instead of sitting here blaming them for everything.

Purposefully misinterpreting verse and using semantics to try and "Gotcha!" me not only won't work but further convinces me that you're a member of the tribe.

×©×œ×•× ×œ××ª×” ×’×•×™, ×ž×©×‘×˜ ×”×™×”×•×“×”×™×

This has literally nothing to do with the issue at hand wtf

You mentioned cutting dicks off.

Fags and Jews rape kids and an insane and disproportionate amount.

Unfortunately, so have most societies throughout history. It's harder to do in the US because of our puritanical attitude towards sex, but we just replace it with other bad things instead, so we're not any better overall.

parent.body:
> And your solution is to jump to the totalitarian phase even sooner?

We're already in the totalitarian phase. Fascism and the Jew OWG are diametric opposites.

> No, how you treat people defines sin.

No, the Bible defines sin. And if you were literate, you'd realize I said Traditionalism DEFIES sin (as in, stands against it) not *defines* it.

> Only in the old testament, the book of your favorite enemy, the joos. I'm very surprised that you like Christianity, given your hatred for Jews, as its deity is a Jew.

None of the Holy Trinity is a Jew, mainly because only Christ walked the Earth as a man, and Christ was not a jew. Leastwise, not the *modern* definition of Jew. The Biblical Hebrew Jews are not in any way related to the Satanist, subhuman parasites we call jews today. 

> You also wouldn't like the part about not following the traditions of mankind very much, or the golden rule.

Purposefully misinterpreting verse and using semantics to try and "Gotcha!" me not only won't work but further convinces me that you're a member of the tribe. 

> "There are castrates who were born that way from the womb, there are castrates who were castrated by people, and there are castrates who castrate themselves because of the kingdom of the heavens. Those who can take this, have it." - Matthew 19:12

This has literally nothing to do with the issue at hand wtf

> I never claimed that this was okay. Stop making a fool of yourself.

Fags and Jews rape kids and an insane and disproportionate amount.

And your solution is to jump to the totalitarian phase even sooner?

We're already in the totalitarian phase. Fascism and the Jew OWG are diametric opposites.

No, how you treat people defines sin.

No, the Bible defines sin. And if you were literate, you'd realize I said Traditionalism DEFIES sin (as in, stands against it) not defines it.

Only in the old testament, the book of your favorite enemy, the joos. I'm very surprised that you like Christianity, given your hatred for Jews, as its deity is a Jew.

None of the Holy Trinity is a Jew, mainly because only Christ walked the Earth as a man, and Christ was not a jew. Leastwise, not the modern definition of Jew. The Biblical Hebrew Jews are not in any way related to the Satanist, subhuman parasites we call jews today.

Purposefully misinterpreting verse and using semantics to try and "Gotcha!" me not only won't work but further convinces me that you're a member of the tribe.
